Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan Dried Gram Positive MIC/Combo Panels - Vancomycin (0.25–64 µg/ml)
MicroScan® Dried Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels –Vancomycin (0.25 – 64 µg/ml)
Specimen Type(s): Colonies grown on solid media of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-positive bacteria
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan Dried Gram Positive MIC/Combo Panels with added vancomycin (0.25–64 µg/ml) for antimicrobial susceptibility testing of gram-positive bacteria.
Indications for Use Summary: Used to determine quantitative and/or qualitative antimicrobial agent susceptibility of colonies grown on solid media of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-positive bacteria, including Enterococci and Staphylococci, with added vancomycin concentrations.
